text: hak cea thang sxng klabneuxklabtaw khxxphay thosʹ tx xallxhˌ (k ca penkar di kæ cea thang sxng) pheraa nænxn hawcı khxng cea thang sxng k xonxxn xyu læw tæ hak cea thang sxng rwm kan txtan khea (than nabi) thæ cring xallxhˌ phraxngkh pen phuthrng khumkhrxng khxng khea xik thang yib ril læa brrda phu sraththa thi di «læa nxkcak nan ma la xik ahˌ k yang pen phu chwyhelux snabsnun xik dwy
